text: BBC Asian Network is a British Asian radio station owned by the BBC. ==Presenters== ===Current presenters=== *Islah Abdur-Rahman *Jassa Ahluwalia *Nayha Ahmad *Nadia Ali *Mehreen Baig *Kan D Man *Ankur Desai *Bobby Friction *Panjabi Hit Squad *Nikita Kanda *Noreen Khan *DJ Limelight *Pritt *Haroon Rashid *Amber Sandhu *Keisha Sethi *Jasmine Takhar ===Former presenters=== *Guz Khan *Nihal Arthanayake *Nikki Bedi *Ameet Chana *Sonia Deol *Preeya Kalidas *Harpz Kaur *DJ Kayper *Aasmah Mir *Murtz *Nerm *Ashanti Omkar *Raj and Pablo *Pathaan *Anita Rani *Adil Ray *Tommy Sandhu *Sunny and Shay *Rozina Sini *Yasser ==References== Category:BBC radio
title: BBC Asian Network
